Name: X-linked nonsyndromic deafness
Definition: A nonsyndromic deafness characterized by an X-linked inheritance mode.

Name: X-linked dominant disease
Definition: A X-linked monogenic disease that has_material_basis_in dominant inheritance.

Name: X-linked recessive disease
Definition: A X-linked monogenic disease that has_material_basis_in recessive inheritance.

Name: obsolete mitochondrial disease
Definition: A X-linked monogenic disease that has_material_basis_in recessive inheritance.
